definition: to refuse nobody (idiom)/all comers welcome
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this
(negative prefix)/not/no
to resist/to repel/to refuse

sentences.english: He is all are welcome to shine on all of the lists to accept, several turn down start to be slanting pouring.
sentences.chinese: 他来者不拒照单全收，几圈下来开始歪歪倒倒。

sentences.english: Wood is indiscriminate in his choice of friends as well as enemies.
sentences.chinese: 伍德不论选择朋友还是敌人都是随随便便，来者不拒。

sentences.english: Dr. Hu keeps open house on Sundays. Nobody then is refused entrance to his house.
sentences.chinese: 每逢周日，胡博士家的大门都会敞开，来者不拒。

sentences.english: Antarctic octopuses eat a wide variety of animals, from clams to fish.
sentences.chinese: 南极章鱼的食谱宽泛，从蛤蚌到鱼类皆来者不拒。

sentences.english: Panama is indeed now far removed from its erstwhile financial free-for-all.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，现在巴拿马金融业远非过去的来者不拒。

sentences.english: He would keep open house and entertain like a prince.
sentences.chinese: 他要大宴宾客，来者不拒，像王公贵族一样。

definition: to accept without question/to take sth at face value
the more the better
to throw oneself in sb's arms/to throw oneself at sb
please excuse me for not complying/to politely decline
outspoken and straightforward/forthright/expansive
to adapt to sb's taste/to fit sb's fancy
to be particularly attentive to (an attractive young lady or man etc)/to fawn upon (an influential politician etc)/to court sb's favor/to ingratiate oneself
to grant whatever is asked for/to accede to every plea
to toast/to propose a toast
lit. seek but fail to get (idiom); fig. exactly what one’s been looking for
all/without any exceptions/categorically
when hungry, you can't pick what you eat (idiom); beggars can't be choosers/When matters are urgent, don't spend time choosing alternatives.
to one's taste/tasty/fig. sth one enjoys
all taboos are off (idiom); anything goes/nothing is taboo
to burst with joy (idiom)/to be over the moon/to be elated
to ingratiate oneself with/to pander to
